availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Allen (Larue County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter)

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Hall Allen in Hardin County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1834. Father of M. J. Allen, Mary B. Allen, and Samuel Allen. Farmer in Larue County in 1850. Carpenter in Larue County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hamiltons, p. 406A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, p. 189.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hodgenville, p. 44B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hardin County Marriages, Film #000390788.
